Path to the Inbox interactive game

Created for Return Path

Game on Return Path's site

Built using PhaserJS

Graphics created by Jonathan Foerster

DOES YOUR BUSINESS RUN ON EMAIL?

Want to try your hand at following the path to the inbox? It can be a long and winding road, but an essential one to travel for any marketer who wants to ensure their emails are making it into their subscribers’ inboxes. This game will test your skills at setting up a successful email marketing program and avoiding being banished to the spam folder.

 Jonathan Whitney
